text: @Mike_Pence I am sure, pretty boy CA Gov. @GavinNewsom didn’t call in yesterday,as he was to busy with his “Focus groups”that has absolutely nothing to do with the looting ,violence& destruction going on in CA right now!3 months of #Covid19 lockdown with no end in site! @realDonaldTrump
